text: 21 Bridges is a 2019 American action thriller movie directed by Brian Kirk. The movie stars Chadwick Boseman as an NYPD detective who shuts down the 21 bridges of Manhattan to find two suspected cop killers (Stephan James and Taylor Kitsch). Sienna Miller, Keith David, and J. K. Simmons also star. Brothers Joe and Anthony Russo produce the movie. 21 Bridges was theatrically released in the United States on November 22, 2019 by STXfilms. It received mixed reviews from critics. ==References== Category:2019 action movies Category:2019 thriller movies Category:2010s action thriller movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:Movies set in the United States
title: 21 Bridges
